    Steven Arzt

      • createLayoutControl

        protected LayoutControl createLayoutControl(soot.SootClass layoutClass)
        Creates an empty layout control that corresponds to the given class
        Parameters:
        layoutClass - The layout class in Android that implements the control
        Returns:
        The newly created layout control

      • setLoadAdditionalAttributes

        public void setLoadAdditionalAttributes(boolean loadAdditionalAttributes)
        Sets whether the parser should load all additional attributes as well. If this option is disabled, it only loads those well-known attributes that influence the data flow analysis.
        Parameters:
        loadAdditionalAttributes - True to load all attributes present in the layout XML files, false to only load the ones required for FlowDroid.

      • isAndroidNamespace

        protected boolean isAndroidNamespace(String ns)
        Checks whether the given namespace belongs to the Android operating system
        Parameters:
        ns - The namespace to check
        Returns:
        True if the namespace belongs to Android, otherwise false
